comment: The drive letter =$propositumLocation= will map to
API Token for interaction with GH (not currently used in non-AppVeyor builds)

local: (& {Read-Host -AsSecureString 'Please provide a password for the Superset user ‘Propositum’.’})

testing: (& {Read-Host -AsSecureString 'Please provide a password for the Superset user ‘Propositum’.’})
